page.title: 30Landscape
page.content:
Staunton country park has a farm that is very popular. The average price to visit is £5. It takes up a whole 1,000 acres!

The Haling Billy track is now a cycle, footpath and bridleway starting by the station theatre and finishing at the centre of Havant. Through a path on the Billy track there are a set of fields that leads out to the Royal Oak and Langstone harbour.

On gravel hill there is queen Elizabeth country park. it is a wide open space that is free to visit all year round. It has a visitor centre in it 2,000 acres! That makes it the biggest country park in Hampshire! Butser hill is another large area that is grate for walking because of it’s challenging uphill's and a nice place to walk your dogs.


Jake & Sophie
